Package tiles

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Connectable
    interface for tiles that are able to adapt their texture to neighbouring tiles
    Movable
    an interface that describes handlers for moving of the tile
    Tile  
    WaterTile
    interface that identifies watertiles
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Boulder
    a sheep tile sheep can be pushed on land tiles that aren't fences and into water doesn't connect
    BoulderGoal
    a tile that acts as sheep and as a goal doesn't connect
    BoulderWater
    a tile that acts as sheep and as water the sheep on this tile can only be pushed onto land tiles connects to neighbouring water tiles (Water, BoulderWater, PlayerWater, Void)
    Empty
    a grass tile sheep can be pushed onto grass players can walk over grass doesn't connect
    Goal
    a goal tile sheep can be pushed onto this tile players can walk over this tile doesn't connect all sheep have to be moved to goal tiles to win
    Player
    a player tile acts as an active player doesn't connect
    PlayerGoal
    a tile that acts as a player and as a goal can be used as a goal tile if no player is present acts as an active player doesn't connect
    PlayerWater
    a tile that acts as a player and as water acts as an active player that can be moved around connects to neighbouring water tiles (Water, BoulderWater, PlayerWater, Void)
    Void
    this tile type is returned if a tile outside the level is queried sheep can't be pushed into void players can walk over void doesn't connect
    Wall
    a fence tile (but sometimes tree or sunflowers) sheep can't be pushed into the fence players can't walk into the fence connects to neighbouring fence tiles (Wall)
    Water
    a water tile sheep can be pushed into water players can walk over water connects to neighbouring water tiles (Water, BoulderWater, PlayerWater, Void)
